title: samata sanjIvi
sahitya:
samaya sanjIvi idE pala samayangaL samarasamAga viLangum


anupallavi

  amaidiyAi mAndargaL anbuDan kUDi arivuDan muyanrE serivuDan vAzhum


caraNam    podu nalamAm sama yOgam adil porundiya vAzhvu vaibhOgam
pudumaiyum pazhamaiyum poli migha nalanE bhUmikkeLLAm iduvE aNikalanE
